name: Magic or Machinations?
description:
Design your own character and choose their personality with a dialogue between you and a sentient AI drone in the middle of space. Then wake up in an open-world desert and try to find your way home by discovering new abilities and using them to cross time and space.

Find the passcodes and where to submit them to progress in the story.

How the story unfolds will be left entirely in your hands. So choose wisely.
